The Catholic Church must make some changes. They have a problem with a lot of people not attending their church. I think this is because the Church is not very accepting of some things. 

For example, they have strong views on gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are a little old-fashioned. If the Church adapts to new ideas, they will not lose followers. Some people do not like the Church's views on these subjects. They think the Church is wrong.

If you are for abortion, you may not want to be part of a Church that says it is wrong. The same is true if you believe in gay marriage. You may not want to be in a Church that does not agree with you.

I do not think it is a good reason that priests cannot be married or that women cannot be priests. Many people have jobs and families. Why can't priests? The Church says priests are married to God, but this is not the same as having a family. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I think the government should not stop gay people from getting married. People are born gay. It's not something they choose to be. I don't believe gay people should be punished for being who they are.

The government should not control who can get married. Marriage is a personal choice. Gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.

It's not a choice to be gay or straight. People are born one or the other. My friend is gay. He did not choose to be gay. He is just born that way.

I don't think the federal government should decide who can get married. It's not a matter of national security or morality. The government should not control people's personal lives.

Everyone should be treated equally. We should not punish people for being different. Gay people should be allowed to get married like everyone else.

I think gay marriage should be made legal. There's no good reason not to. 

Many people think homosexual couples are a threat to the traditional family. But this is not true. Each couple is different, and their problems are not the same as others. It's like two sides of the same coin – heads and tails are not the same. 

Gay couples should have the same rights as everyone else. This includes things like paying taxes and getting medical care. If you're in a gay couple and you're sick, your partner can't be with you in the hospital. This is not fair.

I think this is a silly rule. Many scientific studies have shown that gay couples are like straight couples. They have the same kinds of problems and the same kinds of successes. 

The problem is, people get hung up on the idea of marriage in a church. But gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They want a marriage certificate, which is a legal document. 

If a country allows people to have a civil union, why not a marriage? It's like segregation – separate but unequal.

People worry about adoption and how children will be treated. They worry that gay couples will have problems with their community. They worry that children will be influenced by their parents' choices. But we don't know for sure. 

In New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents because they get bullied in public schools. This is not fair. Parents who protest to get the child removed from the school are not right. 

Parenting skills are the same for gay couples as for straight couples. It's about personality, not about being gay or straight.

The federal government should be involved in this issue and make gay marriage legal in every state. The amendment against gay marriage is not fair. 

President Bush has strong views on this issue, but they are based on his religion. His views on abortion and stem cell research are similar. I don't pay much attention to politics, but it seems that many people's reasons for not allowing gay marriage are based on morality. 

But morality is different for everyone. It's not right to ignore the culture and morality of other people. The government should not make laws that enforce one group's religion on the whole country.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. People should listen to experts, not just their neighbors or friends. 

If people listen to experts, they would see that gay people are not so different. They are just like everyone else.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. 

Not all illegal drugs are bad. They can have good effects. But I think they should not be available for everyone. 

However, if we use them to help people, I think that is okay. Some drugs are illegal, but we use them in the pharmacy because they can help. 

For example, we use oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet. They are controlled substances, but they are helpful. 

Just because marijuana is illegal does not mean it is bad. If people do not fear using it, they might use it correctly. 

Marijuana is not the same as alcohol. If people misuse alcohol, it can cause problems. But marijuana can be used responsibly. 

We should remove the bad image of marijuana. People think it is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. 

If people know more about marijuana, they might use it correctly. And it can be used to help people.

I think the church has changed. It is not as strict as it used to be. I remember when I was a child, I went to church every Sunday. I wore pretty dresses and matching shoes. I thought it was fun.

When I was in school, I saw my friends at church on weekends. We would attend mass together. But now, the church has changed. They have a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes to church, even on Sundays. During the summer, some people wear beach clothes. Families often arrive late.

I think this shows that the church has become more casual. Even on Sundays, people wear jeans and khakis. I think this is a big change.

Now, I want to talk about the problems with Catholic priests and pedophilia. I don't think allowing priests to get married or being female would have prevented these problems. Some married men are still pedophiles. They still have a problem.

When someone becomes a priest, it is their choice. They choose to become a priest. Some religions allow their priests to be married. But I think being married or not married does not make someone a pedophile.

I think people are born with certain problems. They cannot choose to be a pedophile. Genetics may play a role in this. The church cannot change this. If they knew about the problems and covered them up, that is very bad. But I do not think they knew in all cases. 

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

The Iraq war was a big issue. I had problems with it from the beginning. The September 11th attacks had just happened. Many people were still very upset. The US went to war in Iraq for reasons that were not honest.

The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. They said he worked with Osama Bin Laden and caused the 9/11 attacks. But this was not true. They were lying to the American people.

I think this is very bad. The Bush administration did not tell the truth. Even Colin Powell did not believe in the evidence. He said this after giving a big speech at the UN. He said he was not sure of the evidence at the time.

This is wrong. It is against the law for government officials to lie to the people. They did not respect the US Constitution. They did this since 9/11.

The Bush administration wanted to go to war. They planned it before they came into office. The Secretary of the Treasury said this in a book. He said the younger Bush wanted to go to war because of his father's past problems with Saddam Hussein. He also wanted to control Iraq's oil.

I think the war has gone on too long. If the US leaves now, there could be a big problem. The country might fall apart and many more people would die. The US and the UN want to have other countries from the area help keep order in Iraq. But I am not sure this is a good idea. It could cause more problems in the long run.

Iraq will have trouble being in charge of itself. The government is not working well now. The Prime Minister does not have much power. A man named Muqtada al-Sadr has a lot of power in the government now. Many people in Iraq are still fighting over who should be in charge.

I do not have a solution to this problem.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq.

It's hard to understand this war. It's not a declared war. We didn't officially say we're at war. I think this war started because the United States was angry after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. We thought Iraq was involved.

I'm not very informed about this war. I don't know many details. But I think our goal is to help Iraq become a democracy like the United States. We also want their oil.

Staying in Iraq makes people unhappy. If we stay, we have to build democracy, which takes a long time. If we leave, Iraq will be unhappy with us.

I think this is a difficult decision. I don't know what to do. Do we stay and help Iraq? Or do we go home and let them start again?

I'm not sure. I have many thoughts. One thing is clear: it's not fair to stay in Iraq forever. We should not call it a war because it was not officially declared.

We use guns to show our power. But is this the right reason to stay? I don't think so.

I feel bad for President Bush. He's getting a bad name because of this war. It reminds me of the Vietnam War. That was an undeclared war and it didn't work out well.

I have friends whose family members are in Iraq. I feel bad for them. But if we stay, we might be changing Iraq too much. They have their own culture, and we might make things worse.

We might be creating a bigger problem with Al-Kaida. They will hate us more if we try to change them.

I think this war will go on for a long time.

I don't think it's right for a state to say something is legal. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This is very clear.

Trying to make laws about this would go against what the Constitution says. The people who want to make laws about it are really choosing what one church believes is right over another.

Most Catholics and Christians do not want this. But I don't think the government should decide what churches can and cannot make laws about.

The separation of church and state is very important in the United States. It allows for freedom of religion. Making a law about this would be wrong and go against what is already written in the Constitution.

I think the government should not be involved in this issue. The president wants to make a law about this because of his own beliefs. This is not fair to other people who do not believe the same way.

There is no good reason to make a law about this. It would not help the economy and could even be good for society.

In my opinion, the churches should decide what is right, not the government. The government should not make laws about what people believe.

There is much disagreement about the war in Iraq. I do not think the government was honest about the reasons for fighting. They said the war was connected to the attacks on September 11th. But this was not true. The government used this to get the support of the American people.

I am against war. I do not think a preemptive attack is ever a good idea. The war in Iraq was like the war in Vietnam. The US government did not learn from its past mistakes. Many American soldiers died in the war. The US removed the Iraqi government, but it was not prepared for the problems that followed.

The US tried to put a new government in Iraq. But this was not easy. It is always a long process to set up a new government. The US government made it seem easy, but it was not. Democracy is not an easy thing to create.

It is hard to make a decision about the war in Iraq. I have mixed feelings about it. In the 2004 presidential election, I thought about voting for George Bush. He said he would finish what he started. But then I thought, how can we leave Iraq? We took away their government and their way of life. We must see it through, but at what cost? Many American soldiers have died.

The main reason for the war in Iraq was oil. The US wanted control of the oil. Another reason was that Iraq was said to have weapons of mass destruction. But no such weapons were found. We knew North Korea had weapons of mass destruction, but we did not attack them. This shows that the US government is not honest about its reasons for war.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq. But this is not likely.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been for it. Marriage is a personal choice. It is not the government's decision. 

Some people think it is a matter of biology, not how we are raised. They say there is a chemical in the brain that makes people gay. This is true. 

I think it is unfair to deny people rights because of something they cannot control. It is not humane. 

Gay couples are just like other families. They live together and love each other. They are not different from other people. 

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married. They walk their dogs and live like everyone else. It is not fair that they cannot get married. 

The government should not decide who can marry and who cannot. Marriage is a personal choice. 

I have read and heard that some people are born with a certain chemical that makes them gay. It is not because of how they are raised. This is a biological fact. 

Marriage should be a private matter, not a public issue. When a man and woman get married, they can do it secretly if they want to. But when two men or two women want to get married, it is a big deal. This is not fair.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Everyone can see it. 

As a Resident Advisor, I have seen this problem before. You put something online, and it affects people's opinions of you. If you write about violence or shootings, someone will probably say something. You should not put that information online. The internet is public, and everyone sees it.

If you are friends with someone on a website like MySpace, you will see what they post. But the school did not post the information. Someone else found it and told the school. The school must act on it because they want to prevent bad things from happening.

But how do you know what to take seriously? Some people just make jokes. It could be like a class project that went wrong. Or it could be very serious.

In our school, something happened. Someone overheard someone saying something, and they told the school. They found out who said it and looked at their Facebook. They found things that could be taken seriously. When you post on the internet, there is no private life. If you don't want people to see it, don't put it online.

You cannot control what people think. If you don't want people to think something about you, don't post it. School officials should not be friends with students on MySpace or Facebook. They should not look at their posts. But if a student posts something that could be a danger, the school must take it seriously.

School officials should not make fake accounts to friend students. That is not right. As a Resident Advisor, I do not want to friend my residents. I do not want to see what they do when they are not with me. It is not my business.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original purpose was good. It was to help another country gain democracy. 
But now, I think we are fighting for other reasons. 
We want to show the world that we are a strong country. 
I am not sure this is a good reason for war. 

I think the reason for the war was questionable from the start. 
George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein. 
If we wanted to help a country without a fair government, that would be a good reason. 
But if there were personal reasons, it would not be fair. 

I think we made a point when we started the war. 
It was a strong statement. 
But the war has lasted for many years. 
This is not good. 

If we wanted to help a country ruled by a bad leader, that would be a good reason for war. 
But I do not think our reason has been clear for a long time. 
We seem to be fighting just to fight. 
We do not want to end the war without winning. 

I think the war has lasted long enough. 
The government of the other country should take care of itself. 
We should not spend a lot of money on war. 
We have our own problems to solve, like poverty and bad roads. 
We need to spend money on these things. 

We are spending a lot of money on war. 
It is not good to spend a lot of money on war for a long time. 
We should spend money on things that help our own people, like health care and education. 
Now, we are spending money to hurt our own people in a war we are losing. 

This is my opinion.

I have a question to ask for clarification.

Someone was able to stop something bad from happening because they found information on the internet. This person looked at Myspace, a website where people can share information. They found something that could have prevented a life from being lost.

It is true that information on the internet is open to many people. If you post something on Myspace, many people can see it. You must add someone as a friend for them to see your profile, but that means you have given them permission.

When you put information on the internet, you must understand that many people will see it. I think it is good that someone saw the information and was able to stop something bad from happening.

However, it is a problem to have one person watching all the students' profiles all the time. It is not fair to judge people based on what they post on the internet. It is not right to have someone's job be to look at people's profiles all the time.

It depends on why someone looked at the profile. Were they looking for something important or just looking at people's profiles randomly?

I have a Facebook account and it bothers me that there are people who can see things about me. I know that it is possible for people to get information easily. I saw a TV show about a man who got a girl's screen name and started talking to her on instant messenger. He got her to meet him in less than a minute.

It is hard to know who can see your information on the internet. You can limit what you put on the internet, but it is hard to make sure that only people you know can see it. The point of having a profile is to be able to communicate with friends.

My roommate told me that her high school banned students from having Myspace. I am not sure how the school officials had the right to do that.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. I know it's not easy for me to say this, but I was against it at first. Many people were. But now, it's not important to say I was against it from the start. The majority of people think it was a bad idea. 

In the United States, Iraq, and all around the world, most people think the war was a mistake. About 75-80% of the world's population thinks so. In Iraq, 80% of the people think it was a bad idea. Even 70% of the U.S. troops in Iraq think the war was a mistake and want to leave within a year.

The war has been a disaster from the beginning. It's hard to fix things now. The problem is that the United States and Middle Eastern countries have very different cultures. It's hard for us to understand their way of life and bring democracy to their countries. We should consider what the people of Iraq really want, not just what our government thinks is best.

Saddam was a bad leader, but we should have thought carefully before invading his country. We need to weigh the good and bad before making big decisions like that. We can see that the war has caused big problems and made things worse.

I don't think our government has a good reason to stay in Iraq. We should leave now. If we leave slowly, it's okay, but I don't see a reason to stay any longer. Most Iraqis want us to leave, and they know what's best for their country. If we listen to them, it won't be our fault if things go badly. We can still help them after we leave, and it will be better for everyone.

There is still a problem with women and men being treated unfairly in the United States. This is called gender discrimination.

People are not equal everywhere. It depends on the job. Women often have a harder time. This is because society has a long history of men being in charge. Even when there is a law that says everyone is equal, it's hard to make it happen.

Imagine a glass ceiling that women can't break through. They have the skills and education to do a job, but they don't get the chance to do it. This happens when men are not used to working for women.

It's the same for men who stay at home with their children. Society doesn't understand this. They think men should be the ones earning money. If a man stays home, people might think he's not doing his job.

In the fashion industry, men who like fashion are not always taken seriously. People think they don't know about fashion because of their style. But this is not true.

Changing society is slow. We have come a long way, but we have a long way to go. We need to show people that women and men can do different things and be good at them. We can do this by talking about the good things people do, not by forcing people to accept them.

It's good that we're making progress, but we need to be careful. If we do things too fast, people might resist. We need to find a balance.

People can be discriminated against because of where they're from or their job. If someone talks differently, they might be judged by others. This is not fair.

In conclusion, gender discrimination is a problem in the United States. We need to work together to make things more equal. We can do this by being kind and understanding, and by showing people that everyone can be good at different things.

My understanding is that some places did not make marijuana a crime.  They made it a smaller problem, like a traffic ticket.  You get a fine, not arrested and taken to jail.  This makes some people happy.  But some people worry about the future.  They think a marijuana charge can still cause problems, even if it is not a crime.

Some people say it costs too much money to arrest and try people for marijuana.  It costs money to take them to court and pay for lawyers.  So, some cities do not want to make marijuana a smaller problem.  They do not want to spend the money.

But some cities are okay with making marijuana a smaller problem.  Denver is one example.  People in Denver tend to be more open-minded.  This city now has more money to spend on important things like schools, food for the homeless, and help for the elderly.

It is a good idea to make marijuana a smaller problem.  But it is also true that marijuana can be a problem.  If people can buy it anywhere, they might smoke it while driving.  Smoking marijuana is not accepted in many places.  Some people do not want to see it everywhere.

Alcohol can also cause problems.  It can affect how people drive and make decisions.  Marijuana can affect how people live their lives.  People react to substances differently.  Some people can use them without problems, but others cannot.

So, it is hard to say what to do about marijuana.  But it is true that both marijuana and alcohol can cause problems.  We need to be careful and think about how to use them.

I think yes. 
Because 
Traditional things are very important. 
They have been done this way for a long time. 
It is good to be connected to the past. 
But it is also important to be able to change. 
I think this is true. 

Many Catholics go to church every week. 
They do things a certain way. 
I feel that the Catholic Church does not accept people who do not follow its rules very well. 
They also do not accept people of other religions. 
This happened to my parents. 
My mom was a Catholic and my dad was an Episcopalian. 
They could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion. 

The Catholic Church teaches us to love others. 
But it does not practice what it preaches. 
This is because some of its old rules are not good. 
The Church keeps these rules anyway. 

I do not think that allowing priests to marry would make a difference. 
Some people who do bad things will do them anyway. 
They will hurt children, no matter if they are married or not. 
This is a big problem. 

We should focus on stopping people from hurting children. 
Allowing priests to marry will not solve this problem. 
We need to find other ways to stop this from happening.

I'm not sure about this issue yet.  
I don't know if one side is right or wrong.  
This is a very difficult problem we face now.  
It's hard to decide when the line between church and state is unclear.  
Also, defining marriage is a very hard job because it can offend people.  

I don't know if marriage should be decided by the government.  
Some people think it's a special ceremony, like a sacrament.  
If that's true, then people in a marriage could get tax breaks.  
Or they could get special treatment from the government because they were baptized.  
But I think the government should just look at marriage as a civil union.  
It's a union between two people, and that's all.  

They shouldn't ask what kind of marriage it is or what church the couple belongs to.  
It's just two people who are together.  
The issue of gay marriage is similar.  
It's just two people who are in a union.  

If all the states can agree on this, then they should make it a federal law.  
But making a constitutional amendment to stop gay marriage is not right.  
The constitution should not be changed just because many people don't like it.  
It's not important enough to change the constitution over.  
We just need to accept that marriage is between two people who love each other.  

No, I don't think the constitution should be changed for this reason.

I grew up in a Christian family. For me, homosexuality is a complicated issue. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with all parts of the gay lifestyle. But I think it should be legal. I do not think it is a national problem. Each state should make its own decision.

Some states are democratic and some are Republican. Democratic states are more likely to support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how the state feels about this issue. I do not think you can disagree with a state's decision if it decides to allow gay marriage. You chose to live there.

I believe homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. So, each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage.

I already said this. I do not think the president should decide what is best for every state. George Bush does not live in every state. He should not decide how each state runs itself.

Some things should be decided by each state. George Bush will not be president for much longer. If a new president wants to allow gay marriage, the law might change. But that is not necessary. Each state should decide for itself.

No, I do not agree with that. I think each state should make its own decision about gay marriage.

I think school officials have the right to see what students are posting on the internet. Myspace is a public place where people share things for everyone to see. If you post something on the internet, you have to be ready for anyone to see it, including school officials.

Even if you don't put the school's name on it, they can still find it if they want to. They can use their computers at home to look for it. The school officials' job is to keep students safe. If they find something that can help them do this, I think it's okay for them to look at it.

For example, if they go on the internet to see if students are doing things they shouldn't be doing, like drinking or smoking, I think that's okay. It's their job to keep the school safe and make sure students are not breaking the rules.

But if they just go on the internet to catch students and get them in trouble, I think that's not right. It's an invasion of privacy. However, if they find something that helps them keep the school safe, I think it's okay.

Some people might think it's not right for school officials to look at what students are posting on the internet. But I think it's okay as long as it helps keep the school safe. We had lock-down drills in my school to prepare for emergencies. It's like the school officials are doing the same thing, trying to keep the school safe.

They are not trying to catch students; they are trying to prevent bad things from happening, like a school shooting. We had a shooting at Columbine High School, and it was very sad. So, I think school officials are doing the right thing by looking at what students are posting on the internet.

We have to be careful about what we post on the internet because it can come back and hurt us. It's like a big record of everything we do. If we say or do something bad when we're a student, it can come back and cause problems when we're older. It's better to be safe than sorry.

So, I think school officials are okay to look at what students are posting on the internet if it helps them keep the school safe. But they should not just look for ways to catch students. They should look for ways to help the school and keep everyone safe.

I want to talk about the war. At first, I thought it was a good idea. I was personally affected by 9/11. I wanted to go to that country and make them feel what we felt after 9/11.

However, I think we made a mistake. We didn't think about the long-term effects of our actions. We went to war without a plan. This was a big mistake.

I was for the war at first, but now I am against it. I don't think it helped. The people in that country are fighting with each other. They can't fight with us if they can't even get along with themselves.

Unfortunately, 9/11 changed my feelings about that country. I don't care what happens there anymore. I think they are not very nice people when it comes to war. They just want to fight. They don't want to make their country better.

I think we went to war for revenge, not a good reason. We were angry and wanted to fight back. We didn't think about what could happen. President Bush decided to go to war with Iraq. I understand why he did it, but I think we should have had a better plan.

We didn't have unity and clarity about what we wanted to do in that country. We didn't think about how to create order. I think this would have helped us a lot.

I don't think we can change those people. They will always be the same. We are not helping them by staying there. We are just hurting ourselves. We can't stay in that country forever. When we leave, it will collapse. I think we should leave now.

The Catholic Church must make some changes. They have a problem with a lot of people not attending their church. I think this is because the Church is not very accepting of some things. 

For example, they have strong views on gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are a little old-fashioned. If the Church adapts to new ideas, they will not lose followers. Some people do not like the Church's views on these subjects. They think the Church is wrong.

If you are for abortion, you may not want to be part of a Church that says it is wrong. The same is true if you believe in gay marriage. You may not want to be in a Church that does not agree with you.

I do not think it is a good reason that priests cannot be married or that women cannot be priests. Many people have jobs and families. Why can't priests? The Church says priests are married to God, but this is not the same as having a family. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I think the government should not stop gay people from getting married. People are born gay. It's not something they choose to be. I don't believe gay people should be punished for being who they are.

The government should not control who can get married. Marriage is a personal choice. Gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.

It's not a choice to be gay or straight. People are born one or the other. My friend is gay. He did not choose to be gay. He is just born that way.

I don't think the federal government should decide who can get married. It's not a matter of national security or morality. The government should not control people's personal lives.

Everyone should be treated equally. We should not punish people for being different. Gay people should be allowed to get married like everyone else.

I think gay marriage should be made legal. There's no good reason not to. 

Many people think homosexual couples are a threat to the traditional family. But this is not true. Each couple is different, and their problems are not the same as others. It's like two sides of the same coin – heads and tails are not the same. 

Gay couples should have the same rights as everyone else. This includes things like paying taxes and getting medical care. If you're in a gay couple and you're sick, your partner can't be with you in the hospital. This is not fair.

I think this is a silly rule. Many scientific studies have shown that gay couples are like straight couples. They have the same kinds of problems and the same kinds of successes. 

The problem is, people get hung up on the idea of marriage in a church. But gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They want a marriage certificate, which is a legal document. 

If a country allows people to have a civil union, why not a marriage? It's like segregation – separate but unequal.

People worry about adoption and how children will be treated. They worry that gay couples will have problems with their community. They worry that children will be influenced by their parents' choices. But we don't know for sure. 

In New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents because they get bullied in public schools. This is not fair. Parents who protest to get the child removed from the school are not right. 

Parenting skills are the same for gay couples as for straight couples. It's about personality, not about being gay or straight.

The federal government should be involved in this issue and make gay marriage legal in every state. The amendment against gay marriage is not fair. 

President Bush has strong views on this issue, but they are based on his religion. His views on abortion and stem cell research are similar. I don't pay much attention to politics, but it seems that many people's reasons for not allowing gay marriage are based on morality. 

But morality is different for everyone. It's not right to ignore the culture and morality of other people. The government should not make laws that enforce one group's religion on the whole country.

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. People should listen to experts, not just their neighbors or friends. 

If people listen to experts, they would see that gay people are not so different. They are just like everyone else.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. 

Not all illegal drugs are bad. They can have good effects. But I think they should not be available for everyone. 

However, if we use them to help people, I think that is okay. Some drugs are illegal, but we use them in the pharmacy because they can help. 

For example, we use oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet. They are controlled substances, but they are helpful. 

Just because marijuana is illegal does not mean it is bad. If people do not fear using it, they might use it correctly. 

Marijuana is not the same as alcohol. If people misuse alcohol, it can cause problems. But marijuana can be used responsibly. 

We should remove the bad image of marijuana. People think it is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. 

If people know more about marijuana, they might use it correctly. And it can be used to help people.

I think the church has changed. It is not as strict as it used to be. I remember when I was a child, I went to church every Sunday. I wore pretty dresses and matching shoes. I thought it was fun.

When I was in school, I saw my friends at church on weekends. We would attend mass together. But now, the church has changed. They have a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes to church, even on Sundays. During the summer, some people wear beach clothes. Families often arrive late.

I think this shows that the church has become more casual. Even on Sundays, people wear jeans and khakis. I think this is a big change.

Now, I want to talk about the problems with Catholic priests and pedophilia. I don't think allowing priests to get married or being female would have prevented these problems. Some married men are still pedophiles. They still have a problem.

When someone becomes a priest, it is their choice. They choose to become a priest. Some religions allow their priests to be married. But I think being married or not married does not make someone a pedophile.

I think people are born with certain problems. They cannot choose to be a pedophile. Genetics may play a role in this. The church cannot change this. If they knew about the problems and covered them up, that is very bad. But I do not think they knew in all cases. 

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

The Iraq war was a big issue. I had problems with it from the beginning. The September 11th attacks had just happened. Many people were still very upset. The US went to war in Iraq for reasons that were not honest.

The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. They said he worked with Osama Bin Laden and caused the 9/11 attacks. But this was not true. They were lying to the American people.

I think this is very bad. The Bush administration did not tell the truth. Even Colin Powell did not believe in the evidence. He said this after giving a big speech at the UN. He said he was not sure of the evidence at the time.

This is wrong. It is against the law for government officials to lie to the people. They did not respect the US Constitution. They did this since 9/11.

The Bush administration wanted to go to war. They planned it before they came into office. The Secretary of the Treasury said this in a book. He said the younger Bush wanted to go to war because of his father's past problems with Saddam Hussein. He also wanted to control Iraq's oil.

I think the war has gone on too long. If the US leaves now, there could be a big problem. The country might fall apart and many more people would die. The US and the UN want to have other countries from the area help keep order in Iraq. But I am not sure this is a good idea. It could cause more problems in the long run.

Iraq will have trouble being in charge of itself. The government is not working well now. The Prime Minister does not have much power. A man named Muqtada al-Sadr has a lot of power in the government now. Many people in Iraq are still fighting over who should be in charge.

I do not have a solution to this problem.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq.

It's hard to understand this war. It's not a declared war. We didn't officially say we're at war. I think this war started because the United States was angry after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. We thought Iraq was involved.

I'm not very informed about this war. I don't know many details. But I think our goal is to help Iraq become a democracy like the United States. We also want their oil.

Staying in Iraq makes people unhappy. If we stay, we have to build democracy, which takes a long time. If we leave, Iraq will be unhappy with us.

I think this is a difficult decision. I don't know what to do. Do we stay and help Iraq? Or do we go home and let them start again?

I'm not sure. I have many thoughts. One thing is clear: it's not fair to stay in Iraq forever. We should not call it a war because it was not officially declared.

We use guns to show our power. But is this the right reason to stay? I don't think so.

I feel bad for President Bush. He's getting a bad name because of this war. It reminds me of the Vietnam War. That was an undeclared war and it didn't work out well.

I have friends whose family members are in Iraq. I feel bad for them. But if we stay, we might be changing Iraq too much. They have their own culture, and we might make things worse.

We might be creating a bigger problem with Al-Kaida. They will hate us more if we try to change them.

I think this war will go on for a long time.

I don't think it's right for a state to say something is legal. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This is very clear.

Trying to make laws about this would go against what the Constitution says. The people who want to make laws about it are really choosing what one church believes is right over another.

Most Catholics and Christians do not want this. But I don't think the government should decide what churches can and cannot make laws about.

The separation of church and state is very important in the United States. It allows for freedom of religion. Making a law about this would be wrong and go against what is already written in the Constitution.

I think the government should not be involved in this issue. The president wants to make a law about this because of his own beliefs. This is not fair to other people who do not believe the same way.

There is no good reason to make a law about this. It would not help the economy and could even be good for society.

In my opinion, the churches should decide what is right, not the government. The government should not make laws about what people believe.

There is much disagreement about the war in Iraq. I do not think the government was honest about the reasons for fighting. They said the war was connected to the attacks on September 11th. But this was not true. The government used this to get the support of the American people.

I am against war. I do not think a preemptive attack is ever a good idea. The war in Iraq was like the war in Vietnam. The US government did not learn from its past mistakes. Many American soldiers died in the war. The US removed the Iraqi government, but it was not prepared for the problems that followed.

The US tried to put a new government in Iraq. But this was not easy. It is always a long process to set up a new government. The US government made it seem easy, but it was not. Democracy is not an easy thing to create.

It is hard to make a decision about the war in Iraq. I have mixed feelings about it. In the 2004 presidential election, I thought about voting for George Bush. He said he would finish what he started. But then I thought, how can we leave Iraq? We took away their government and their way of life. We must see it through, but at what cost? Many American soldiers have died.

The main reason for the war in Iraq was oil. The US wanted control of the oil. Another reason was that Iraq was said to have weapons of mass destruction. But no such weapons were found. We knew North Korea had weapons of mass destruction, but we did not attack them. This shows that the US government is not honest about its reasons for war.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq. But this is not likely.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been for it. Marriage is a personal choice. It is not the government's decision. 

Some people think it is a matter of biology, not how we are raised. They say there is a chemical in the brain that makes people gay. This is true. 

I think it is unfair to deny people rights because of something they cannot control. It is not humane. 

Gay couples are just like other families. They live together and love each other. They are not different from other people. 

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married. They walk their dogs and live like everyone else. It is not fair that they cannot get married. 

The government should not decide who can marry and who cannot. Marriage is a personal choice. 

I have read and heard that some people are born with a certain chemical that makes them gay. It is not because of how they are raised. This is a biological fact. 

Marriage should be a private matter, not a public issue. When a man and woman get married, they can do it secretly if they want to. But when two men or two women want to get married, it is a big deal. This is not fair.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Everyone can see it. 

As a Resident Advisor, I have seen this problem before. You put something online, and it affects people's opinions of you. If you write about violence or shootings, someone will probably say something. You should not put that information online. The internet is public, and everyone sees it.

If you are friends with someone on a website like MySpace, you will see what they post. But the school did not post the information. Someone else found it and told the school. The school must act on it because they want to prevent bad things from happening.

But how do you know what to take seriously? Some people just make jokes. It could be like a class project that went wrong. Or it could be very serious.

In our school, something happened. Someone overheard someone saying something, and they told the school. They found out who said it and looked at their Facebook. They found things that could be taken seriously. When you post on the internet, there is no private life. If you don't want people to see it, don't put it online.

You cannot control what people think. If you don't want people to think something about you, don't post it. School officials should not be friends with students on MySpace or Facebook. They should not look at their posts. But if a student posts something that could be a danger, the school must take it seriously.

School officials should not make fake accounts to friend students. That is not right. As a Resident Advisor, I do not want to friend my residents. I do not want to see what they do when they are not with me. It is not my business.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original purpose was good. It was to help another country gain democracy. 
But now, I think we are fighting for other reasons. 
We want to show the world that we are a strong country. 
I am not sure this is a good reason for war. 

I think the reason for the war was questionable from the start. 
George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein. 
If we wanted to help a country without a fair government, that would be a good reason. 
But if there were personal reasons, it would not be fair. 

I think we made a point when we started the war. 
It was a strong statement. 
But the war has lasted for many years. 
This is not good. 

If we wanted to help a country ruled by a bad leader, that would be a good reason for war. 
But I do not think our reason has been clear for a long time. 
We seem to be fighting just to fight. 
We do not want to end the war without winning. 

I think the war has lasted long enough. 
The government of the other country should take care of itself. 
We should not spend a lot of money on war. 
We have our own problems to solve, like poverty and bad roads. 
We need to spend money on these things. 

We are spending a lot of money on war. 
It is not good to spend a lot of money on war for a long time. 
We should spend money on things that help our own people, like health care and education. 
Now, we are spending money to hurt our own people in a war we are losing. 

This is my opinion.

I have a question to ask for clarification.

Someone was able to stop something bad from happening because they found information on the internet. This person looked at Myspace, a website where people can share information. They found something that could have prevented a life from being lost.

It is true that information on the internet is open to many people. If you post something on Myspace, many people can see it. You must add someone as a friend for them to see your profile, but that means you have given them permission.

When you put information on the internet, you must understand that many people will see it. I think it is good that someone saw the information and was able to stop something bad from happening.

However, it is a problem to have one person watching all the students' profiles all the time. It is not fair to judge people based on what they post on the internet. It is not right to have someone's job be to look at people's profiles all the time.

It depends on why someone looked at the profile. Were they looking for something important or just looking at people's profiles randomly?

I have a Facebook account and it bothers me that there are people who can see things about me. I know that it is possible for people to get information easily. I saw a TV show about a man who got a girl's screen name and started talking to her on instant messenger. He got her to meet him in less than a minute.

It is hard to know who can see your information on the internet. You can limit what you put on the internet, but it is hard to make sure that only people you know can see it. The point of having a profile is to be able to communicate with friends.

My roommate told me that her high school banned students from having Myspace. I am not sure how the school officials had the right to do that.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. I know it's not easy for me to say this, but I was against it at first. Many people were. But now, it's not important to say I was against it from the start. The majority of people think it was a bad idea. 

In the United States, Iraq, and all around the world, most people think the war was a mistake. About 75-80% of the world's population thinks so. In Iraq, 80% of the people think it was a bad idea. Even 70% of the U.S. troops in Iraq think the war was a mistake and want to leave within a year.

The war has been a disaster from the beginning. It's hard to fix things now. The problem is that the United States and Middle Eastern countries have very different cultures. It's hard for us to understand their way of life and bring democracy to their countries. We should consider what the people of Iraq really want, not just what our government thinks is best.

Saddam was a bad leader, but we should have thought carefully before invading his country. We need to weigh the good and bad before making big decisions like that. We can see that the war has caused big problems and made things worse.

I don't think our government has a good reason to stay in Iraq. We should leave now. If we leave slowly, it's okay, but I don't see a reason to stay any longer. Most Iraqis want us to leave, and they know what's best for their country. If we listen to them, it won't be our fault if things go badly. We can still help them after we leave, and it will be better for everyone.

There is still a problem with women and men being treated unfairly in the United States. This is called gender discrimination.

People are not equal everywhere. It depends on the job. Women often have a harder time. This is because society has a long history of men being in charge. Even when there is a law that says everyone is equal, it's hard to make it happen.

Imagine a glass ceiling that women can't break through. They have the skills and education to do a job, but they don't get the chance to do it. This happens when men are not used to working for women.

It's the same for men who stay at home with their children. Society doesn't understand this. They think men should be the ones earning money. If a man stays home, people might think he's not doing his job.

In the fashion industry, men who like fashion are not always taken seriously. People think they don't know about fashion because of their style. But this is not true.

Changing society is slow. We have come a long way, but we have a long way to go. We need to show people that women and men can do different things and be good at them. We can do this by talking about the good things people do, not by forcing people to accept them.

It's good that we're making progress, but we need to be careful. If we do things too fast, people might resist. We need to find a balance.

People can be discriminated against because of where they're from or their job. If someone talks differently, they might be judged by others. This is not fair.

In conclusion, gender discrimination is a problem in the United States. We need to work together to make things more equal. We can do this by being kind and understanding, and by showing people that everyone can be good at different things.

My understanding is that some places did not make marijuana a crime.  They made it a smaller problem, like a traffic ticket.  You get a fine, not arrested and taken to jail.  This makes some people happy.  But some people worry about the future.  They think a marijuana charge can still cause problems, even if it is not a crime.

Some people say it costs too much money to arrest and try people for marijuana.  It costs money to take them to court and pay for lawyers.  So, some cities do not want to make marijuana a smaller problem.  They do not want to spend the money.

But some cities are okay with making marijuana a smaller problem.  Denver is one example.  People in Denver tend to be more open-minded.  This city now has more money to spend on important things like schools, food for the homeless, and help for the elderly.

It is a good idea to make marijuana a smaller problem.  But it is also true that marijuana can be a problem.  If people can buy it anywhere, they might smoke it while driving.  Smoking marijuana is not accepted in many places.  Some people do not want to see it everywhere.

Alcohol can also cause problems.  It can affect how people drive and make decisions.  Marijuana can affect how people live their lives.  People react to substances differently.  Some people can use them without problems, but others cannot.

So, it is hard to say what to do about marijuana.  But it is true that both marijuana and alcohol can cause problems.  We need to be careful and think about how to use them.

I'm not sure about this issue yet.

The constitution should not be changed just because many people don't like it.

We just need to accept that marriage is between two people who love each other.  

No, I don't think the constitution should be changed for this reason.

I grew up in a Christian family. For me, homosexuality is a complicated issue. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with all parts of the gay lifestyle. But I think it should be legal. I do not think it is a national problem. Each state should make its own decision.

Some states are democratic and some are Republican. Democratic states are more likely to support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how the state feels about this issue. I do not think you can disagree with a state's decision if it decides to allow gay marriage. You chose to live there.

I believe homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. So, each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage.

I already said this. I do not think the president should decide what is best for every state. George Bush does not live in every state. He should not decide how each state runs itself.

No, I do not agree with that. I think each state should make its own decision about gay marriage.

I think school officials have the right to see what students are posting on the internet. Myspace is a public place where people share things for everyone to see. If you post something on the internet, you have to be ready for anyone to see it, including school officials.

Even if you don't put the school's name on it, they can still find it if they want to. They can use their computers at home to look for it. The school officials' job is to keep students safe. If they find something that can help them do this, I think it's okay for them to look at it.

For example, if they go on the internet to see if students are doing things they shouldn't be doing, like drinking or smoking, I think that's okay. It's their job to keep the school safe and make sure students are not breaking the rules.

But if they just go on the internet to catch students and get them in trouble, I think that's not right. It's an invasion of privacy. However, if they find something that helps them keep the school safe, I think it's okay.

Some people might think it's not right for school officials to look at what students are posting on the internet. But I think it's okay as long as it helps keep the school safe. We had lock-down drills in my school to prepare for emergencies. It's like the school officials are doing the same thing, trying to keep the school safe.

They are not trying to catch students; they are trying to prevent bad things from happening, like a school shooting. We had a shooting at Columbine High School, and it was very sad. So, I think school officials are doing the right thing by looking at what students are posting on the internet.

We have to be careful about what we post on the internet because it can come back and hurt us. It's like a big record of everything we do. If we say or do something bad when we're a student, it can come back and cause problems when we're older. It's better to be safe than sorry.

So, I think school officials are okay to look at what students are posting on the internet if it helps them keep the school safe. But they should not just look for ways to catch students. They should look for ways to help the school and keep everyone safe.

I want to talk about the war. At first, I thought it was a good idea. I was personally affected by 9/11. I wanted to go to that country and make them feel what we felt after 9/11.

However, I think we made a mistake. We didn't think about the long-term effects of our actions. We went to war without a plan. This was a big mistake.

I was for the war at first, but now I am against it. I don't think it helped. The people in that country are fighting with each other. They can't fight with us if they can't even get along with themselves.

Unfortunately, 9/11 changed my feelings about that country. I don't care what happens there anymore. I think they are not very nice people when it comes to war. They just want to fight. They don't want to make their country better.

I think we went to war for revenge, not a good reason. We were angry and wanted to fight back. We didn't think about what could happen. President Bush decided to go to war with Iraq. I understand why he did it, but I think we should have had a better plan.

We didn't have unity and clarity about what we wanted to do in that country. We didn't think about how to create order. I think this would have helped us a lot.

I don't think we can change those people. They will always be the same. We are not helping them by staying there. We are just hurting ourselves. We can't stay in that country forever. When we leave, it will collapse. I think we should leave now.
